data.text: The 🌍  is home to 1.8B young people — the largest generation of youth in history. Here's how the UN works with and for them: https://t.co/YAwnwKakBc https://t.co/eO9lQpu4kS

Violence forced these kids from their homes & they now live in a camp for displaced people in Central African Republic.

The UN is on the ground to protect them and provide lifesaving support. 

More: https://t.co/voxaqdwKQS https://t.co/ggZhJ2JUz1
This week at UNHQ: @UN_CTED #TerrorsmTrends event. Details: https://t.co/JOmFyL6m2d
What's happening this week at the UN? #COP23, World Diabetes Day, Int'l Day for Tolerance & much more. List of events is here: https://t.co/HDzhfjjC8u https://t.co/LhjLPlwt14
